item.title: Leopaster
item.description: Discontinued project. Developed in 2015 Quick Status Bar Menu on OS X that allows you to quickly paste code on @DHowettâ€™s ghostbin.com. ghostbin.com is a simple pasteboard service that allows people to paste code or any other text and to quickly share a link to them. These services allow developers to share code snippets faster to either request help with an specific piece of code, or to help others with theirs (Other uses may apply).
